channel.title: Typescript on INFOVERLOAD
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on INFOVERLOAD

item.title: How to build a gRPC server and client in TypeScript
item.description: gRPC gRPC is an open-source RPC framework that makes communication over the network performant and scalable by taking advantage of binary formats through leveraging HTTP/2 features for transporting and using protocol buffers (out of the box) for serializing data. It supports generating server and client bindings in many languages across many platforms. Common use cases include connecting microservices, connecting mobile devices to backend services, and optimizing container to container communication.
